price: (41) Or do they have partners?[1731] Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ
footnotes: [1731]- i.e., those to whom they attribute divinity other than Allāh or partners from among themselves.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: am lahum shurakāu falyatū bishurakāihim in kānū ṣādiqīna
